channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How luxury homebuilding giant Toll Brothers took the drama out of CEO succession
item.description: The Fortune 500 company offers a masterclass in CEO hand-offs.

item.title: A cautionary Hollywood tale: the Ellisons’ lose-lose Paramount positioning
item.description: Hollywood history is a trail littered with cautionary tales, and Netflix's Greg Peters and Ted Sarandos have framed a lose-lose coin toss for the Elli...

item.title: Productivity gains fuel U.S. growth while hiring slows
item.description: EY Chief Economist Gregory Daco says businesses are generating growth with fewer workers and rising efficiency.

item.title: Jeff Bezos tells Gen Z entrepreneurs to gain work experience before launching new companies: ‘I started Amazon when I was 30’
item.description: The Amazon founder reminds Gen Z that Mark Zuckerberg and Bill Gates are the exception.

item.title: Molson Coors CEO: We’re doing our part to solve society’s ‘occasion problem’ – and we’re getting some unexpected help
item.description: Actor Christopher Walken is on board for our new Miller Lite campaign because these days, we could all use more “Legendary Moments.”

item.title: Capital One, Barclays shares feel pressure from Trump move on credit-card rates
Why markets are so sensitive to this latest twist in the Trump-Powell showdown
JPMorgan trading desk says it's now cautious due to threat to Fed independence
While gold and silver soar, bond action rather subdued after Fed subpoena
